level.heading: Procuring for house of prostitution.
level.text: Any person who, within the District of Columbia, shall pay or receive any money or other valuable thing for or on account of the procuring for, or placing in, a house of prostitution, for purposes of sexual intercourse, prostitution, debauchery, or other immoral act, any individual, shall be guilty of a felony and, upon conviction, shall be punished by imprisonment for not more than 5 years and by a fine of not more than $1,000.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-119, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 22-2704.
